headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS MINI-CONVECTRON GAUGE
description: Mini-Convectron Gauge    The Granville Phillips 275-801   Mini-Convectron Gauge   has a high resolution from atmosphere to 1 milliTorr.  This used   Mini-Convectron Gauge   will be fully refurbished and will meet Granville Phillip's performance specifications. It is sold with our ninety day warranty.
